title: Hobo Stew (Beef and Veggies in Foil Packets)
directions: Take 2 long pieces of aluminum foil and criss cross them, one under the other and place on the counter. Do this 3 more times, making a total of 4.

Divide the ground sirloin into 4 equal parts and make large, flat patties out of each. Place one patty in the center of each criss-crossed foil and season with sea salt, pepper and several dashes of Worcestershire sauce.
Season with salt, pepper, several more dashes of Worcestershire sauce, and a light drizzle of olive oil.

Seal up packets by bringing the four ends of foil up to the top together and folding over, Leave room inside the packets for air to circulate and steam. Place packets on cookie sheet in 350 degree oven for 1 hour.
ingredients: 2 cobs fresh corn, cut from cob, optional
4 small Yukon Gold potatoes, cubed, optional
